name: Merge_MN
display_help: Near death, a Spirit will attempt to merge with a friendly entity. If the Spirit encounters a fellow spirit, the two will be consumed to create a Coalesced Spirit. If the Spirit encounters anything else, the Spirit will be consumed and significantly buff their target for 20s. Recharge: Long

name: Merge_Middle_MN
display_help: Near death, a Spirit will attempt to merge with a friendly entity. If the Spirit encounters a fellow spirit, the two will be consumed to create a Coalesced Spirit. If the Spirit encounters anything else, the Spirit will be consumed and significantly buff their target for 20s.

name: Merge_Complete_MN
display_help: A Coalesced Spirit emerges!

name: Merge_LT
display_help: Near death, a Spirit will attempt to merge with a friendly entity. If the Spirit encounters a fellow spirit, the two will be consumed to create a Coalesced Spirit. If the Spirit encounters anything else, the Spirit will be consumed and significantly buff their target for 20s. Recharge: Long

name: Merge_Middle_LT
display_help: Near death, a Spirit will attempt to merge with a friendly entity. If the Spirit encounters a fellow spirit, the two will be consumed to create a Coalesced Spirit. If the Spirit encounters anything else, the Spirit will be consumed and significantly buff their target for 20s.

name: Merge_Complete_LT
display_help: A Formed Impression emerges!

name: Merge_BS
display_help: Near death, a Spirit will attempt to merge with a friendly entity. If the Spirit encounters a fellow spirit, the two will be consumed to create a Coalesced Spirit. If the Spirit encounters anything else, the Spirit will be consumed and significantly buff their target for 20s. Recharge: Long

name: Merge_Middle_BS
display_help: Near death, a Spirit will attempt to merge with a friendly entity. If the Spirit encounters a fellow spirit, the two will be consumed to create a Coalesced Spirit. If the Spirit encounters anything else, the Spirit will be consumed and significantly buff their target for 20s.

name: Merge_Complete_BS
display_help: A Formed Impression emerges!

name: Merge_Complete_BS_as_LT
display_help: A Formed Impression emerges!

name: Possession
display_help: The focused hatred of an Enraged Spectre can restore and sustain nearby Apparitions.

name: Touch_of_Fear
display_help: The horrific collection of castoff spirits that make up a Fearsome Reflection are capable of disabling prey with their Touch of Fear.

name: Possession
display_help: The focused hatred of an Enraged Spectre can restore and sustain nearby Apparitions.

name: Hateful_Burst
display_help: You unleash a bolt of pure hatred at your target. The target suffers lethal damage and negative energy damage, as well as a reduction in their damage output.

name: Wrathful_Infusion
display_help: You create a prison of suffering around your target, crushing their very soul with your overwhelming hatred. The target is enraged, forcing them to attack you, and suffers negative energy damage.

name: Crushing_Hate
display_help: You create a prison of suffering around your target, crushing their very soul with your overwhelming hatred. The target is held in place and suffers negative energy damage. The force of the hatred is so enormous that this power also has the potential to manifest with lethal damage.

name: Dissipate
display_help: The spirit possessing this person emerges!

name: Hateful_Gloom
display_help: You unleash a barrage of pure misery at your target. The target suffers lethal damage and negative energy damage, as well as a reduction in their damage output.

name: Weaken_Resolve
display_help: You strike at your target with depression made manifest, causing negative energy damage and dampening their ability to move via any means.

name: Baleful_Thrash
display_help: You create a whip of hatred, sweeping it in a wide cone. This causes negative energy damage to enemies and reduces their damage output. The whip's wounds manifest physically, causing bleeding, but there is a chance that the force of the strike could also inflict lethal damage.
display_short_help: Short Ranged (Cone), Moderate DMG(Negative Energy/Lethal), DoT (Lethal), -DMG (All)

name: Aura_of_Aggression
display_help: You strike at your target with pure aggression, causing negative energy damage and reducing the speed at which their powers recharge.

name: Aura_of_Possession
display_help: You are possessed by an Apparition!

name: Aura_of_Possession
display_help: You are possessed by an Apparition!

name: Emerge_MN
display_help: The spirit possessing this person emerges!

name: Emerge_LT
display_help: The spirit possessing this person emerges!

name: Emerge_BS
display_help: The spirit possessing this person emerges!

name: Damage_MN
display_help: The Apparitions are embodiments of hatred and anger given form. They have a strong resistance to negative energy and lethal attacks. However, they are vulnerable to energy.

name: Damage_LT
display_help: The Apparitions are embodiments of hatred and anger given form. They have a strong resistance to negative energy and lethal attacks. However, they are vulnerable to energy.

name: Damage_BS
display_help: The Apparitions are embodiments of hatred and anger given form. They have a strong resistance to negative energy and lethal attacks. However, they are vulnerable to energy.

name: Damage_EB
display_help: The Apparitions are embodiments of hatred and anger given form. They have a strong resistance to negative energy and lethal attacks. However, they are vulnerable to energy.

name: Damage_AV
display_help: The Apparitions are embodiments of hatred and anger given form. They have a strong resistance to negative energy and lethal attacks. However, they are vulnerable to energy.

name: Status_All
display_help: The Apparitions are embodiments of hatred and anger given form. In addition to the standard resistances exhibited by others of their kind, merged forms and more powerful Apparitions have resistance to being held, slept or confused.

name: Crushing_Hate
display_help: You create a prison of suffering around your target, crushing their very soul with your overwhelming hatred. The target is held in place and suffers negative energy damage. The force of the hatred is so enormous that this power also has the potential to manifest with lethal damage.

name: Collective_Unconscious
display_help: You can tap into the collective unconscious to empower nearby Apparitions.

name: Dissipate
display_help: More powerful Apparitions do not simply fade away upon defeat. Instead, they have a small chance of lingering on as a Fractured Apparition.

name: Enraged_Regeneration
display_help: The focused hatred of an Enraged Spectre can restore and sustain nearby Apparitions.

name: Attract
display_help: The raw hatred emanating from an Enraged Spectre serves as a beacon for lesser Spirits, bringing them to the assistance of the Spectre.

name: Possess
display_help: An Enraged Spectre is too strong to simply be defeated. As a last strike against their enemies, the Spectre reaches out and possesses an enemy, causing confusion.

name: Explosive_Rage
display_help: You launch coalesced rage at your target. Upon contact, this erupts in a small area, causing negative energy and lethal damage to those caught in the burst, as well as reducing their damage output.

name: Hateful_Blast
display_help: You unleash a bolt of pure hatred at your target. The target suffers lethal damage and negative energy damage, as well as a reduction in their damage output.

name: Wrathful_Siphon
display_help: You direct unrelenting anger at your target, causing them to panic. This causes them to suffer lethal and negative energy damage, as well as a reduction in the effectiveness of all status-altering powers. Some of the damage done is returned to you as healing.

name: Baleful_Lash
display_help: You channel negative energy into a whip and Lash out at your foe, dealing damage and causing bleeding. Lash has longer range than most melee attacks, will reduce the target's damage resistance and also has a chance to knockdown your target. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
display_short_help: Close, Moderate DMG(Negative Energy), Minor DoT (Lethal), -Res (All), Knockdown

name: Wrathful_Strike
display_help: You direct unrelenting anger into a melee attack. This attack deals smashing and negative energy damage to your target, but will occasionally strike with such force that your target is knocked down or knocked back.
display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG (Smash/Negative Energy), Chance for Knockdown and Knockback
